items.content_html: What to do? maybe just stay at w10? I do NOT now 🤔 Hate w11, or go linux?
items.content_text:
What to do? maybe just stay at w10? I do NOT now 🤔 Hate w11, or go linux?

I've had a perfectly functioning Windows 10 desktop which Microsoft refuses to upgrade to Windows 11 for no valid reason. And with security updates ending soon, I explored options for a modern OS on my hardware. I hope it helps others in my shoes: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g-xV9dMTuX0

Techlore https://social.lol/@techlore/114220125624858525

items.content_html: Never back down, but always hold your head high! 💪✨ Embrace challenges with confidence and let your strength shine through! #Motivation #StayStrong #Strong
items.content_text: Never back down, but always hold your head high! 💪✨ Embrace challenges with confidence and let your strength shine through!  #Motivation #StayStrong #Strong

items.content_html: Hmmm….. I have 2fa and security codes in Bitwarden, works quite well
items.content_text:
Hmmm..... I have 2fa and security codes in Bitwarden, works quite well

For many years, people have asked me if it's safe to keep 2FA codes in the same place as your passwords. Here's my opinion on whether or not you should do it:
https://youtu.be/xHEX6wWYgS0

Techlore https://social.lol/@techlore/114203138700864322

items.content_html: Want to read: The Power of Habit: Why We Do What We Do in Life by Charles Duhigg 📚

items.content_html: “When you’re feeling low, don’t let others add to the weight. Surround yourself with positivity and remember: your feelings matter! 🌟 #MentalHealth #StayPositive”
items.content_text: "When you're feeling low, don't let others add to the weight. Surround yourself with positivity and remember: your feelings matter! 🌟 #MentalHealth #StayPositive"

items.content_html: 🌟 Remember, no matter how tough life gets, you have the strength to rise up again. Embrace resilience and let your spirit shine! 💪✨ #Strength #Resilience #NeverGiveUp
items.content_text: 🌟 Remember, no matter how tough life gets, you have the strength to rise up again. Embrace resilience and let your spirit shine! 💪✨ #Strength #Resilience #NeverGiveUp

items.content_html: “All I want is to live my life in peace! 🌟 Remember, don’t let anyone dim your light or bring you down. Embrace positivity and shine bright! ✨ #LiveYourBestLife”
items.content_text: "All I want is to live my life in peace! 🌟 Remember, don’t let anyone dim your light or bring you down. Embrace positivity and shine bright! ✨ #LiveYourBestLife"

items.content_html: “When life gets tough, hold on tight! Remember, God is by your side, guiding you through every challenge. Trust in His plan and keep the faith. 🙏✨ #Hope #Faith”

items.content_html: “Feeling lost? Remember, seeking professional help is a brave step toward healing. You’re not alone—there’s always hope and support waiting for you. 💚 #MentalHealthMatters”
